content.rendered:
OSGeo Korean Chapter has printed promotional stickers for the FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul conference.(http://foss4g.asia/2023) If you are interested in receiving these stickers for the purpose of promoting the FOSS4G-Asia conference in your region, please let us know.(foss4g-asia-2023-seoul-info@googlegroups.com) We will pay the postage fee and send the stickers to you.

FOSS4G-Asia 2023 will be held in Seoul from November 28th to December 2nd. The Call for Presentations for FOSS4G-Asia 2023(https://foss4g.asia/2023/call-for-presentations/) is open now until August 11th. We encourage you to submit your proposals. We welcome a wide range of topics and look forward to receiving numerous submissions.


See you in Seoul soon!
